channel.title: Any Site Editing.. (Need to know Html and other languages)
channel.description:
[b]Note: Mods, you can delete this if it is not needed. :)[/b]
Well, as most of you know, you can 'Right Click > Veiw Source'
Then you can take that scripting and edit and delete parts.
What I do, I get the source, take parts out that I don't want.
Get a freeweb's site, then upload the scripting from there.
Then I click on the file from the Freeweb's Admin Panel. (Whatever you guys call it)
Please keep the flaming down in this, I don't want to have a bad start of my Mopar life.

Well, as most of you know, you can ‘Right Click > Veiw Source’

Then you can take that scripting and edit and delete parts.
